title: Ukrainian military had 49 combat engagements with Russian forces near Terny of Donetsk region, Ivanivske, Andriyivka of Donet...
content: Ukrainian military had 49 combat engagements with Russian forces near Terny of Donetsk region, Ivanivske, Andriyivka of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Semenivka and Nevelske of Donetsk region, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka, Staromayorske of Donetsk region and Robotyne of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
